intro: Ready to slide into the fun?
description:
Get ready for a nostalgic holiday adventure with Santa Run Retro! Join Santa as he dashes, slides, and glides through a retro-style snowy wonderland, collecting gifts for kids around the globe. Maneuver through zig-zagging paths, dodge obstacles, and enjoy the charm of a pixelated winter forest filled with surprises, hidden bonuses, and magical power-ups to enhance your journey.

Whether it’s Christmas or not, Santa Run Retro is the ultimate celebration of timeless fun, packed with exciting challenges and vibrant worlds to explore. Perfect for gamers of all ages, it’s time to relive the holiday spirit with a retro twist.
